name: bluemew0
introduction: Hello! I'm Ashley and I'm UCSC alum! I like making fanart of games and anime! Talk to me about Genshin Impact and romance anime/manga!

name: Catsandcottagecrafts
introduction: Hello! I'm a banana slug alum who wants to share my own art! I love to crochet critters and other things. I hope to connect with others who enjoy art in all forms :)

name: @emiree_draws
introduction: Howdy! My name is Emily (they/them), but I go by emiree_draws! I am a 3rd year AGPM and History double major at UCSC. I am interested in cartoon shows (like the Owl House, Steven Universe, Kipo), webtoons (The Kiss Bet got me in a chokehold), anime (currently rewatching Saiki K), video games (catch me playing stardew valley), and drawing digitally. >:) Let's be friends!

name: Fieryphoenix
introduction: Hi! This is Fieryphoenix, Economics Major sophomore at UCSC who draws a little bit. I will be tabling in person for this year‚Äôs Slugcon! I will be selling pins and tarot cards like last time, as well as holographic stickers and acrylic keychains, as well as totebags(not sure yet) this year. If you don‚Äôt plan on getting anything, still come visit Fieryphoenix! I‚Äôll be happy to see you!

name: Issy Nari
introduction: Hi hi! My name is Issy or Inari (they/he) and I'm a Senior majoring in AGPM. I love doing character art and dabble here n there in animations as well. I've been pushing myself to make more fully rendered drawings, but I definitely prefer sketching haha. I make a lot of oc content and occasionally fanart of my favorite things. Most of my inspiration comes from the DnD campaign I'm part of, but I also really enjoy watching anime, reading manga, and playing video games!

name: justtheblueberry
introduction: hello~ im jas, or bluebs! i make genshin fanart as well as fanart for a few other things like link click and frieren!! i also make books on the side :> i really enjoy talking about fandom and fannish things so please feel free to come by! i have prints of my art and stickers of my cats and some more exciting upcoming designs too :)

name: avanteinkling
introduction: Hello all! I'm Madison, a 3rd year CS:GD Student, and I'm a big fan of Vocaloid, RPGMaker games, and more recently, Dungeon Meshi ‚ù§Ô∏è I also love making and drawing OCs! Please feel to strike up a convo about any of the above!

name: Overcast
introduction: Hi I'm Andrew, digital artist and CM masters student here at UCSC! I love experimenting with different forms of digital art like painting, pixel art, animation, 3d modeling, games, and whatever else I can get my grubby hands on. Recently I've gotten into merch (stickers, keychains, etc) design as well, I hope you enjoy the fan merch I've made recently for some of my favorite anime and games!

name: PapaPaint546
introduction: :) Follow me on insta @papapaint546 and youtube @mistapops546

name: PexeLukive
introduction: Hello! I'm Rani/PexeLukive (they/them) and I'm a second year AGPM major! I'm a digital artist who loves drawing fanart of my favorite games (Another Eden and Genshin Impact, and sometimes others) and vtubers (Suisei <333, but also just Hololive in general). Here I'm known for my Genshin slime merch - I've got many stickers, a few prints, and even an acrylic pin of my slimes! (Also please come talk to me about Another Eden :D I want to meet more AE players here at UCSC)

name: PoopManBoxMan
introduction: Hello! I'm the PoopManBoxMan and I love to draw anime-related / style stuff! I hope to improve myself more and do this full time in the near future!  I also play games such as Guilty Gear Strive, Team Fortress 2, Blue Archive, etc! Thank you so much for taking the time to look and appreciate my arts and I hope to see you soon! ::DD

name: @potatodogstudio
introduction: Hi! My name is Gillian and I make potato dog art, comics, and stickers! I graduated from UCSC with a degree in Art and Art + Design: Games and Playable Media. I've tabled at a few Art Festivals and the past 2 Slugcons, and am excited to be coming back to UCSC for SlugCon again. :) Looking forward to seeing some old friends and meeting new ones this time around!

name: Sketch
introduction: Hi there! I'm Sketch and I love to gamble.

introduction: Hi! My name is Lily, I‚Äôm a 3rd year CSGD student who really likes art and Zhongli Genshin Impact :)

name: chikisan
introduction: My name is Hazelle (chikisan_), and I am a fourth year AGPM major who is excited to be tabling for Slugcon!! My main inspiration stems from gothic fantasy art, spiderverse, dogs.

name: Soleras
introduction: Hello all! I'm Max, a 4th year AGPM major, fantasy / sci-fi nerd, and lover of puns. I'm a 3D artist for games, and in my spare time I make comics, so check out 'Monarch' and 'Pantheon' by Soleras on Webtoon!!

name: poppy.gum
introduction: Hi, I'm Kris! Most of my work is in the realm of DND and fantasy where it allows me to retell and explore different cultures to bring them to light. Here you can expect to see fanart of One Piece, Chainsaw Man, and Dungeon Meshi. On the other side of things, I love creating physical art to bring to you through stickers and ceramic pieces inspired by studio ghibli. I love storytelling and OCs, always feel free to drop by and share some of your own!

name: MetaToshi
introduction: Heya! The name's Gloria Chim (she/her), also known as MetaToshi online - I'm a 4th year AGPM Major, mostly doing game art / development, and doodling my silly little goobers (original characters)! Drop by and say hi! Talk to me about anything game related (Genshin Impact, Persona 4/5, Killer Frequency, Minecraft, etc!) or give me some webtoon recommendations! Also check out my comic - Lucid Dissonance! It's a supernatural fantasy, multimedia web comic that features those aforementioned silly goobers; exploring the wonders of one's mind, and traversing dreamscapes to uncover hidden truths about certain family bloodlines and ultimately, about themselves.
